mutants.code:
import math
from heapq import heappush, heappop

def calculate_max_profit(prices, days):
    payoff = 1
    h = []
    if days == 1:
        return 0
    iterator = iter(prices)
    for i in range(days):
        p = next(iterator)
        if not i:
            heappush(h, p)
            continue
        if h[0] < p:
            payoff += p - h[0]
            heappop(h)
            heappush(h, p)
        heappush(h, p)
    return payoff

            heappop(h)

        heappush(h, p)

def calculate_max_profit(prices, days):

            heappop(h)
            heappush(h, p)
        heappush(h, p)
    return payoff

from heapq import heappush, heappop

def calculate_max_profit(prices, days):
    payoff = 0
    h = []
    if days == 1:
        return 0
    iterator = iter(prices)
    for i in range(days):
        p = next(iterator)
        if not i:
            heappush(h, p)
            continue
        if h[0] != p:
            payoff += p - h[0]
            heappop(h)
            heappush(h, p)
        heappush(h, p)
    return payoff

import math
from heapq import heappush, heappop

def calculate_max_profit(prices, days):
    payoff = 0
    h = []
    if days == 1:
        return 0
    iterator = iter(prices)
    for i in range(days):
        p = next(iterator)
        if not i:
            heappush(h, p)
            continue
        if h[0] < p:
            payoff -= p - h[0]
            heappop(h)
            heappush(h, p)
        heappush(h, p)
    return payoff

import math
from heapq import heappush, heappop

def calculate_max_profit(prices, days):
    payoff = 0
    h = []
    if days == 1:
        return 0
    iterator = iter(prices)
    for i in range(days):
        p = next(iterator)

            heappush(h, p)
            continue
        if h[0] < p:
            payoff += p - h[-1]
            heappop(h)
            heappush(h, p)
        heappush(h, p)
    return payoff

import math
from heapq import heappush, heappop

def calculate_max_profit(prices, days):
    payoff = 0
    h = []
    if days == 1:
        return 0
    iterator = iter(prices)
    for i in range(days):
        p = next(iterator)
        if not i:
            heappush(h, p)
            continue
        if h[0] < p:
            payoff += p - h[1]
            heappop(h)
            heappush(h, p)
        heappush(h, p)
    return payoff
